CompanyPage.title: About Zatas
CompanyPage.description: We transform ideas into digital products that impact millions of people around the world
history: Zatas' journey began when a personal trainer, recommended by other programmers, contacted one of the partners, Bruno, looking for a way to optimize his student management. With this proposal in hand, Bruno invited Gabriel and Antony to collaborate on the application's development.

The project was a success and showed the team the power of collaboration. To complement the group's technical skills, Bryan was invited to the partnership, bringing his expertise in marketing and design.

Zatas was founded on this foundation: the union of diverse skills with the purpose of offering complete solutions. The company started by solving a specific problem and today continues with the same passion for turning each client's challenges into successful projects.

The name 'Zatas' was chosen for its strong and memorable sound. It refers to the word 'exact', reflecting the essence of the company's work: the search for precision, logic, and data intelligence in the construction of each solution. Zatas is synonymous with the exact solution for each client's challenge.
CompanyPage.cardMissionText: To create innovative digital solutions that transform businesses and improve people's lives through technology.
CompanyPage.cardVisionText: To be a global leader in digital product development, recognized for excellence and positive impact.
CompanyPage.cardValuesText: Continuous innovation, technical excellence, teamwork, transparency, and customer focus.

TeamPage.title: Our Team
TeamPage.description: Meet the founders who make it all possible

joao-silva.name: João Silva
joao-silva.bio: Serial entrepreneur with over 15 years of experience in technology. Passionate about creating solutions that impact millions of people.

experience.description: Leading the strategic vision and growth of the company, expanding to 5 countries.
Responsible for launching 3 products that generated R$50M in revenue.

maria-santos.name: Maria Santos
maria-santos.bio: Software engineer specializing in scalable system architecture. Technical leader focused on innovation and quality.

experience.description: Leading a team of 50+ engineers, building infrastructure serving 1M+ users.
Consulting for Fortune 500 companies on cloud migration.

pedro-oliveira.name: Pedro Oliveira
pedro-oliveira.bio: Product designer focused on user experience. Believes design is about solving problems, not just aesthetics.

experience.description: Leading product and design vision, creating award-winning experiences.
Responsible for redesigning the app used by 40M+ customers.

ana-costa.name: Ana Costa
ana-costa.bio: Specialist in growth marketing and branding. Built marketing strategies that generated 300% growth in startups.

experience.description: Leading all marketing and brand growth initiatives.
Responsible for 10x growth in the customer base.
